mapper.select: SELECT t1.pid as pid, t1.tel as tel, t1.description as description, t2.photo_url as photo FROM "gp"."public"."poi_050000" as t1 LEFT JOIN "gp"."public"."poi_050000_photo" as t2 ON t1.pid = t2.pid WHERE t1.pid = #{pid};

SELECT t1.pid as pid,t1."name" as "name",t1.address as address,t1.lon as lon,t1.lat as lat,t2."name" as "type" FROM poi_050000 as t1 JOIN poi_code as t2 ON t1.type_code=t2.type_code WHERE st_contains(st_buffer((SELECT wkb_geometry FROM station WHERE "name"=#{center}), #{distance}, 'quad_segs=4'), wkb_geometry) AND t1."type_code"/#{maskCode}*#{maskCode} = #{typeCode};
